description: First differences between n for which sigma(n) > sigma(n+1), which are not 2.
formula: The expansion of A053238 excluding 2's. a(n) = A053238(A053240(n)).
maple: with(numtheory): f := [seq( `if`((sigma(i) > sigma(i+1)),i,print( )), i=1..5000)];seq( `if`(f[i+1] - f[i] <> 2,f[i+1] - f[i],print( )), i=1..2000);
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Jan 10, 2000
